description: iClever--Ever CleverThe iClever Universal Bluetooth Stereo Transmitter is a compact, wireless transmitter that connects with any 3.5mm stereo jack to provide Bluetooth convenience. The music from your MP3, PC and other devices can be transmitted wirelessly to your Bluetooth stereo receiver with much ease. Built in with a rechargeable Li-ion battery, this transmitter can be used for 9-10 hours on a single full charge. Additionally, you may safely leave the power supply plugged into the transmitter at all times.Features:- Bluetooth V2.1 + EDR makes for added data transfer rate and reduced latency in sound transmission, ensuring optimal audio quality well suited for watching TV/movies .- Transforms any device (e.g. TV, computer, MP3 player, PSP) with 3.5mm audio-out jack into a Bluetooth-capable music streaming solution with no additional drivers required.- Charging and working in parallel (with no static noise) is supported.- Supports A2DP, enabling your audio device to transfer stereo audio wirelessly.- Embedded Li-ion battery allows for convenient recharging.- Energy saving capability: powers off automatically if pairing fails for over 5 minutes.Technical Specifications:- Bluetooth version: Bluetooth V2.1+EDR- Bluetooth profile: A2DP- Frequency response: 2.4GHZ-2.4835GHZ- Receiving sensitivity: -744dB- Effective range: Up to 10m- Charging input voltage: DC 5V- Working time: Up to 10 hours- Charging time: About 2hoursPackage Content:- 1 x Bluetooth Transmitter- 1 x USB Charging Cable- 1 x User Manual
title: iClever IC-BTT01 Portable Stereo Wireless Bluetooth Transmitter/Adapter Dongle for TV, Desktop, Laptop, Tablet, MP3/MP4 Player, CD and DVD Players and all other Audio Devices with 3.5mm Audio-out Jack
